name: Gnome's maze/labyrinth
description:
Gnome’s maze is maze/labyrinth puzzle for kids and adults. Guide the gnome through different routes in this free maze adventure. Collect coins and complete each maze puzzle by moving the gnome to the flag. Spend coins to stop time or show the way to the flag. The difficulty level of each maze/labyrinth puzzle increases with every level. Super adventure in labyrinth.
FEATURES: 
- Easy to control for everybody
- All mazes are made by hand, no randomized levels
- Random gifts (stop time, clean maze, show way)
- Explore and find a way out of more than 30 different mazes/labyrinths.
- Zoom in and zoom out screen for explore mazes/labyrinths.
- Explore the maze, collect coins, and unlock new levels! 
- Watch ad video to get free coins.

If you want to become a king of maze this game for you.

Labyrinth Gnome combines a game-runaway game, a maze game, as well as a puzzle - not one hour is required for passing complex, exciting levels. Also, the Dwarven Labyrinth is suitable for fans of retro games.

Want to play in new levels - just write about it.
